title: Noam Chomsky - 1995-03-11 - Speaking On Colombia - With Juan Pablo Ordonez
description:
Be sure to pick at least 720p for best sound quality.


On March 11, 1995, Noam Chomsky spoke along with Juan Pablo Ordonez (a Colombian human rights lawyer) about Colombia and the US role in the ongoing tragedy in that nation.  Chomsky's talk begins at 38:00 minutes in.  Question and answer follows the talks.
